attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for murderers!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simple really, if there's no doubt the person has murdered then they should suffer the death penalty. And as for the bleating of the human rights brigade, leave the killers in prison for a year and if no one has proven them innocent, carry the sentence out!! criminals will think twice before they committ an offence.
